author: StarKiller22515
title: Fly Robin Fly
review: This is a great representation of robin from The LEGO Batman Movie. The glasses are comically big just like in the movie and he has he hort shorts just like in the movie. They did a very good job with his hair and it looks just like it does on his minifigure. He only has the printed torso piece but that is okay. I would highly recommend this to anyone who liked the LEGO Batman Movie.
